verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid, of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] the LORD'S הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz The earth וּמְלוֹאָ֑הּ <WH4393> u-me-lo-'Ah; and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> te-Vel, thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> ve-Yo-she-vei and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ה֭וּא <WH1931> hu he עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon יַמִּ֣ים <WH3220> yam-Mim it upon the seas יְסָדָ֑הּ <WH3245> ye-sa-Dah; For he hath founded וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- upon נְ֝הָר֗וֹת <WH5104> ne-ha-Rot, it upon the floods יְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <WH3559> ye-chon-Ne-ha. and established

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh Who shall ascend בְהַר־ <WH2022> ve-har- into the hill יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; Jehovah וּמִי־ <WH4310> u-mi- Who יָ֝קוּם <WH6965> Ya-kum may stand בִּמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> bim-Kom country קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. in his holy

נְקִ֥י <WH5355> ne-Ki He that hath clean כַפַּ֗יִם <WH3709> chap-Pa-yim, hands וּֽבַר־ <WH1249> u-var- and a pure לֵ֫בָ֥ב <WH3824> le-Vav heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher Who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- has not נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> na-Sa who hath not lifted up לַשָּׁ֣וְא <WH7723> lash-Shav unto vanity נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; his soul וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> ve-Lo not נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' nor sworn לְמִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> le-mir-Mah. deceitfully

יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> yis-Sa He shall receive בְ֭רָכָה <WH1293> Ve-ra-chah the blessing מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; from the LORD וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah, and righteousness מֵאֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> me-'e-lo-Hei from the God יִשְׁעֽוֹ׃ <WH3468> yish-'O. of his salvation

זֶ֭ה <WH2088> zeh This דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> Dor This [is] the generation; דֹּרְשֹׁו do-re-shov כדֹּרְשָׁ֑יו <WH1875> do-re-Shav; ask קמְבַקְשֵׁ֨י <WH1245> me-vak-Shei him that seek פָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> fa-Nei-cha thy face יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko O Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> se-'U Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים׀ <WH8179> she-'a-Rim O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <WH7218> ra-shei-Chem, your heads וְֽ֭הִנָּשְׂאוּ <WH5375> Ve-hin-na-se-'u and be ye lift up פִּתְחֵ֣י <WH6607> pit-Chei doors עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; ye everlasting וְ֝יָב֗וֹא <WH935> ve-ya-Vo, shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> hak-ka-Vod. of glory

מִ֥י <WH4310> mi Who זֶה֮ <WH2088> zeh he מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech Who [is] this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <WH3519> hak-Ka-Vod glorious יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עִזּ֣וּז <WH5808> 'iz-Zuz strong וְגִבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> ve-gib-Bor; and mighty יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor mighty מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah. in battle

שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> se-'U Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים׀ <WH8179> she-'a-Rim O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <WH7218> ra-shei-Chem, your heads וּ֭שְׂאוּ <WH5375> U-se-'u even lift [them] up פִּתְחֵ֣י <WH6607> pit-Chei doors עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; ye everlasting וְ֝יָבֹא <WH935> Ve-ya-vo shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> hak-ka-Vod. of glory

מִ֤י <WH4310> mi Who ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he זֶה֮ <WH2088> zeh is this מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech Who is this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <WH3519> hak-Ka-Vod of glory יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Jehovah צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu He מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech he [is] the King הַכָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> hak-ka-Vod of glory סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah
